WorldObjects

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • WorldObjects.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NPC

    public class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains attributes and behaviors of characters in the game, both those controlled by the player and the NPCs. Created 1/30/2016
